doc.title: Stardust
doc.plot: A hip, gritty saga of the future about young pioneers trying to make it rich off space gold, while in search of personal freedom. And about the rugged Sheriff who must keep the peace in this Galactic Age boomtown, called "Stardust". Fast-paced and action-packed, it's the continuing story of Cowboys and Aliens, set 120 years from now on the faraway desert planet rightly known as Hades, a hell beyond the stars.
